name: Inflict Pain, Mass
book: Pathfinder Roleplaying Game Occult Adventures © 2015, Paizo Inc.
target: one creature/level, no two of which can be more than 30 ft. apart.
text: This spell functions like inflict pain except as noted above.
target_zh: 每等级一个生物，任意两者之间的距离不超过30尺
text_zh: 除了上文所述内容之外，该法术的功能如同苦痛刑罚（Inflict Pain）一般。
